price: 97. Prisiekiame Allahu, mes tikrai buvome akivaidžioje klaidoje.
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
